Japanese: よーし⏎たたくぞー
Google Translate: Okay, let's hit it!

Japanese: リーフはつかれたが⏎いい仕事をした
Google Translate: Leaf was tired but did a good job.

Japanese: リーフの剣LVが#f5ffになった!!
Google Translate: Leaf's sword LV has become #f5ff!!

Japanese: バルダの剣LVが#f5ffになった!!
Google Translate: Barda's sword LV has become #f5ff!!

Japanese: ジャスミンの剣LVが#f5ffになった!!
Google Translate: Jasmine's sword LV has become #f5ff!!

Japanese: 鉄の合成により⏎一定時間『きぜつ』こうかをえた!
Google Translate: By synthesizing iron, ⏎ gained a “kisetsu” shape for a certain period of time!

Japanese: 銀の合成により⏎一定時間影のてきに大ダメージ!
Google Translate: By synthesizing silver, ⏎Great damage to shadows for a certain period of time!

Japanese: 金の合成により⏎一定時間炎の追加ダメージ!
Google Translate: By combining gold, ⏎additional fire damage for a certain period of time!

Japanese: 水晶の合成により⏎一定時間こうげきはんいが広がる!
Google Translate: By synthesizing crystals, ⏎Kougekihani spreads for a certain period of time!

Japanese: ジャードは少し⏎かじのコツをつかんだようだ
Google Translate: Jard seems to have gotten the hang of ⏎Kazi a little bit.

Japanese: かじのこころえ⏎⏎下画面をれんぞくタッチすると⏎リーフが剣をきたえます⏎メーターがたまると剣のLVがあがります
Google Translate: Kaji no Kokoro⏎⏎Touch the bottom screen to make Leaf raise a sword⏎As the meter fills up, the sword's level will increase

Japanese: かじのこころえ⏎⏎下画面をれんぞくタッチすると⏎ジャードが剣をきたえます⏎メーターがたまると剣のLVがあがります
Google Translate: Kaji no Kokoro ⏎⏎Touch the bottom screen to make ⏎Jard prepare a sword ⏎As the meter accumulates, the sword's level will increase
